meanings.sent1: The spider had eight membered legs.
meanings.sent2: The doll was missing one membered arm.
meanings.sent3: The robot with detachable membered parts was a hit at the science fair.
meanings.sent4: The puzzle pieces fit together like perfectly membered limbs.
meanings.sent5: The tree's branches were intricately membered, reaching out in all directions.

meanings.definition: Being a part of a group or organization
meanings.sent1: She was a valued membered employee of the company.
meanings.sent2: The team welcomed their newest membered player.
meanings.sent3: The group of membered friends always had a great time together.
meanings.sent4: The orchestra played harmoniously, each instrument a vital membered part.
meanings.sent5: The community center was bustling with membered activities for all ages.
